i like anime shows.
i can be quite forgetful.

content.text: Hey! I'm interested in your harmonica. What's your favorite song to play?
I like playing the theme from Cowboy Bebop. What's your favorite kind of cookie?
I like chocolate chip cookies, but I love to experiment with different flavors.
I like to try new things too, but I'm not much of a fan of hot weather.
I agree. I live in a pretty hot area, so I try to stay inside as much as possible during the summer.
I'm not a huge fan of school either. I think I'm more of a hands-on learner.
I'm a weightlifter, so I'm definitely a hands-on learner. I'm the general manager of the local grocery store, so I have to be pretty hands-on.
That sounds like a really fun job! I'm a waitress, so I'm also pretty hands-on.
It's a lot of work, but it's also pretty rewarding. I'm saving up my allowance to buy a new bike. What are you saving up for?
I'm not sure yet. I might save up for a new guitar or a new tattoo
